links.*: The History of Galadriel and Celeborn

wikitext.*:
An ancient title for the rulers of the land of [[Lothlórien]], of which [[Amroth]] was the last when he abandoned it leaving no heir.

When [[Celeborn]] and [[Galadriel]] came to rule Lórien, they renounced the title of "King" and "Queen" and remained known as [[Lord of Lórien|Lord]] and [[Lady of Lórien]].<ref>{{UT|Amroth}}, p. 245</ref>

==Holders==
* [[Amdír]] (c. {{FA|587}} - {{SA|3434}})
* [[Amroth]] (c. {{SA|3434}} -{{TA|1981}})
